mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, ADOPT_NO,THUMNAIL , ADOPT_NAME , ADOPT_AGE, ADOPT_TYPE , ADOPT_ADDRESS , ADOPT_DEL_FL, ADOPT_COMPL FROM "ADOPT" WHERE MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY ADOPT_NO DESC

SELECT REVIEW_TITLE, READ_COUNT, REVIEW_NO, TO_CHAR(REVIEW_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REVIEW_WRITE_DATE"
FROM "REVIEW" WHERE MEMBER_No=#{memberNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT C.REVIEW_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, R.REVIEW_TITLE, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "COMMENT_WRITE_DATE" FROM "REVIEW" R JOIN "COMMENT" C ON R.REVIEW_NO = C.REVIEW_NO WHERE C.COMMENT_NO IN ( SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM "COMMENT" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}) ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC
SELECT A.ADOPT_TITLE, A.ADOPT_NO, A.ADOPT_COMPL FROM "BOOKMARK" B JOIN "ADOPT" A ON (A.ADOPT_NO = B.ADOPT_NO) WHERE B."MEMBER_NO" = #{memberNo}
